login.title: Login with Atlassian
login.token_helper: for your account and paste above
login.error_message: Oops! The username + token combination provided are not valid. Please try again.

settings.title: Settings
settings.reset_confirm: Please confirm that you want to reset all settings to the {{appName}} defaults.

badCredentials.title: Bad Credentials
badCredentials.description1: Your credentials are either invalid or expired.
badCredentials.description2: Please try removing your account and authenticating again.

badRequest.title: Bad Request
badRequest.description: Something went wrong making the API request.

network.title: Network Error
network.description1: Unable to connect to Atlassian Cloud.
network.description2: Please check your network connection, including whether you require a VPN, and try again.
